description: This file defines a Flutter widget, RecordsScreen, which displays a placeholder UI for medical records, including static text and a list of record placeholders represented by custom widgets (_RecordPlaceholder).

classes.name: RecordsScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a header and placeholders for medical records.

classes.name: _RecordPlaceholder
classes.description: A private stateless widget representing a placeholder for a single medical record entry.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for RecordsScreen and _RecordPlaceholder widgets.
